name: patient_id
description: Unique patient identifier

name: NCD_identifier
description: National Coverage Determination (NCD) identifier for Percutaneous Image-Guided Lumbar Decompression for Lumbar Spinal Stenosis.

name: procedure_PILD_description
description: Description of Percutaneous Image-Guided Lumbar Decompression (PILD) as a posterior decompression of the lumbar spine performed under indirect image guidance without direct visualization, involving percutaneous removal of lamina portion and debulking of ligamentum flavum, performed under x-ray guidance with contrast media.

name: diagnosis_lumbar_spinal_stenosis_flag
description: Indicates the presence of Lumbar Spinal Stenosis (LSS).

name: diagnosis_symptomatic_LSS_flag
description: Indicates the presence of symptomatic Lumbar Spinal Stenosis (LSS).

name: treatment_unresponsive_conservative_therapy_LSS_flag
description: Indicates if Lumbar Spinal Stenosis (LSS) is unresponsive to conservative therapy.

name: coverage_type
description: The type of Medicare coverage, specifically Coverage with Evidence Development (CED).

name: clinical_study_enrollment_flag
description: Beneficiary enrollment in an approved clinical study for PILD.

name: PILD_coverage_effective_date_section_I
description: Effective date for PILD coverage under clinical study criteria outlined in Section I.

name: clinical_study_design_section_I
description: Clinical study design requirements for Section I, which include prospective, randomized, and controlled.

name: clinical_study_minimum_followup_time_description
description: Minimum length of patient follow-up time required for clinical study protocols.

name: clinical_study_compliance_45_CFR_Part_46_flag
description: Clinical study must be in compliance with 45 Code of Federal Regulations (CFR) Part 46 concerning the protection of human subjects.

name: clinical_study_compliance_21_CFR_Parts_50_56_flag
description: Clinical study regulated by the FDA must be in compliance with 21 CFR parts 50 and 56.

name: clinical_study_registration_ClinicalTrials_gov_flag
description: Clinical study must be registered on the ClinicalTrials.gov website prior to the enrollment of the first study subject.

name: clinical_study_data_release_window_section_I_months
description: Results of clinical studies under Section I must be made public within 24 months of the end of data collection.

name: PILD_coverage_effective_date_section_II
description: Effective date for PILD coverage under prospective, longitudinal study criteria outlined in Section II.

name: PILD_device_FDA_approved_cleared_flag
description: PILD procedures must use an FDA-approved/cleared device.

name: clinical_study_type_section_II
description: Clinical study type for Section II coverage, specifically a prospective, longitudinal study.

name: clinical_study_prerequisite_CMS_approved_RCT_flag
description: For Section II coverage, the prospective, longitudinal study must have completed a CMS-approved Randomized Control Trial (RCT) that met criteria in Section I.

name: clinical_study_data_release_window_section_II_months
description: Results of clinical studies under Section II must be made public within 12 months of the study’s primary completion date.

name: clinical_study_registry_AHRQ_RoPR_flag
description: Registries associated with clinical studies must also be registered in the AHRQ Registry of Patient Registries (RoPR).

name: procedure_code_CPT
description: CPT procedure code 0275T for Percutaneous Image-Guided Lumbar Decompression (PILD).

name: ICD_10_coding_updates_flag
description: Indicates that ICD-10 conversions and other coding updates specific to NCDs are performed for maintenance.
